price: ߣߍߡߊ ߞߏߛߐ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏߢߌߡߊߟߐ߲ߠߊ ߛߙߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߕߋ߲߬ ߠߋ߬
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
